name: Infinity Donut
description:
A sci-fi Flappy Bird clone made for a college Game Jam assignment centered around the theme of "Stuck in a loop". For this, I utilized Unity, Visual Studio, Blender, Illustrator, and Google Images in a span of 2 weeks and somehow got a higher grade than I expected for the end result.

I then made an upgraded version utilizing Unity's Universal Render Pipeline (URP) for another college assignment that had me utilize the engine's post-processing tools to enhance the space theme of the game.

Both versions of the game have been uploaded for those who wish to compare them with each other.
